code: import axios from"axios";const API_KEY="6e4371b772eea12edaefd0fc6e9a6ab4";const BASE_URL="https://api.openweathermap.org/data/2.5";export const getCurrentWeather=async city=>{const response=await axios.get("".concat(BASE_URL,"/weather"),{params:{q:city,appid:API_KEY,units:"metric"}});return response.data;};export const getHistoricalWeather=async(lat,lon)=>{const timestamps=Array.from({length:5}).map((_,i)=>Math.floor(Date.now()/1000-i*86400));const requests=timestamps.map(ts=>axios.get("".concat(BASE_URL,"/onecall/timemachine"),{params:{lat,lon,dt:ts,appid:API_KEY,units:"metric"}}));const responses=await Promise.all(requests);return responses.map(res=>res.data);};
